name: Footnotes (Orczuk)
description:
You are in the land of Bail, you may think yourself a hero but so does everyone else. 

See the lives of two warring factions and try to make a name for yourself before you inevitable demise. 

Made of Barckeyes Game Jam 2023.1 with the theme of An End is a New Beginning. To follow this theme the game switch the protagonist to whoever defeated them, allowing you to explore both of the factions.

May have gotten a little over ambition so thing will probably be broken. Enjoy!

Controls:

Walk - WASD/Arrow Keys

Space - Interact/Choose
